name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. David COADES, Appellant

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. David COADES, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Judgment of sentence and order affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: David W. Wood, Jr., West Chester, for appellant.

casebody.head_matter:
455 A.2d 1194
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. David COADES, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 27, 1983.
Decided Feb. 3, 1983.
David W. Wood, Jr., West Chester, for appellant.
Lee Ruslander, Chief, Appeals Div., West Chester, Stuart Suss, Reading, for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA, JJ.
